signDate: Murmansk, Arctic Circle - Northern Union Territory

scripts.say: It is my pleasure to inform you that we've successfully completed the first part of Her Majesty's supply delivery.
The second convoy is expected to arrive later this day. Please make the necessary preparations for its arrival.
We greatly appreciate your support. These supplies will surely be a great help in our battle against the Red Axis.
Please inform Her Majesty that she has our gratitude and our blessings. God Save the Queen.
Certainly. We are eagerly awaiting your future participation in the war. God Save the Queen!
Thank goodness... We've finally finished our last convoy mission... Now we can go home...
Just the thought of getting to drink Belfast's tea again is helping me warm up inside~!
We cannot let our guard down just yet. We may still encounter danger on our way back.
Be it these freezing temperatures, or threats lurking beneath the surface...
Sheffield, is something the matter? You haven't spoken much for some time now.
That girl, Avrora... her smile didn't seem sincere to me.
I don't believe we should trust the Northern Union.
You're overthinking the matter. We have formed an alliance with them so we have every reason to mutually trust one another.
Do you not agree that it is our duty as Royal Maids to have faith in Her Majesty's and the Commander's judgement?
... Let's hope I'm simply being paranoid.
... Now, according to our intel, there is a chance that we will encounter moderate Siren opposition on our way home, therefore I urge everyone to remain vigilant! Now, let us set sail!
